recipes.description: A classic Italian pasta dish made with eggs, cheese, pancetta, and black pepper.
instructions: Bring a large pot of salted water to a boil.
Cook spaghetti according to package instructions until al dente.
While spaghetti is cooking, in a separate bowl, whisk together eggs, Pecorino Romano cheese, and Parmesan cheese. Season with black pepper.
In a skillet, cook pancetta or guanciale until crispy.
Once spaghetti is cooked, drain it and return it to the pot. Immediately add the egg mixture and cooked pancetta. Toss everything together until well combined and creamy.
Serve hot with additional grated cheese and black pepper, if desired.

recipes.description: A quick and flavorful stir-fry made with tender chicken, fresh vegetables, and a savory sauce.
ingredients: 2 boneless, skinless chicken breasts, thinly sliced
instructions: In a small bowl, mix together soy sauce, oyster sauce, hoisin sauce, and sesame oil. Set aside.
Heat vegetable oil in a large skillet or wok over high heat.
Add chicken slices and stir-fry until cooked through. Remove from skillet and set aside.
In the same skillet, add garlic, ginger, onion, bell pepper, and broccoli. Stir-fry until vegetables are tender-crisp.
Return cooked chicken to the skillet. Pour the sauce over the chicken and vegetables. Stir well to combine and cook for another 2-3 minutes.
